Posts.Content: Aren't you the funny one. It sure is not a laughing matter to those who suffer everyday from dead bone slivers just lifting out of their jaw or a hole that won't heal from an extracted tooth that now opens into the sinus cavity and causes liquid in the mouth to actually run out the nose; not to mention the constant battles with infection on an already depleated immune system from chemo treatments. This is what my sister faces everyday. Insensitive people (perhaps like you?) are most likely the reason Zometa is still available today.
Posts.Signature: With Jesus and a puppy, you can lick anything!
Posts.Title: Zometa Aredia and Fosamax linked to Jaw Bone Loss

Posts.Content: I have forwarded this forum link to my sister who is suffering from MAJOR bone loss in her jaw and confirmed by her dentist. She is presently wondering how many other's are suffering with this problem as well and considering joining a national law suit. Thank you for the links you have provided. If any of you have any information that can help my sister move forward in this, please e-mail me and I will forward to her. OR IF YOU ARE READING THIS SIS...JOIN THE FORUM!
Posts.Signature: With Jesus and a puppy, you can lick anything!
